createuser.title: Create User
createuser.subtext: Provide access to accounts and delivery locations and configure their overall Shell markethub experience
createuser.selectuserdesc: Super users have extra administration privileges such as creating or modifying other users. You can amend privileges before you finish creating this account.
createuser.productDesc: Select which product lines this user will work with. You can select more than one.
createuser.emailTooltip: They will use this email address to log in to their account.
createuser.selectAtleastOneDelLoc: Please select an address for the following accounts:
createuser.accountDesc: Choose which accounts the user will have access to.
createuser.deliveryDesc: Select which locations the user can access to arrange deliveries.
createuser.searchdelplaceholder: Search by account number or delivery information
createuser.searchaccPlaceholder: Search by account number, name or address
createuser.privilegesDesc: Configure the user’s experience of Shell MarketHub by selecting which features are available.
createuser.reviewdesc: Check that all the details are correct and select Create user to complete their account set up.
createuser.emailErrMsg: This user already has an account with Shell MarketHub.
createuser.updateEmailWarn: Updating the email address will clear all information previously entered for this user, and reset all their settings.
createuser.updateEmailTitle: Updating email address will reset information
createuser.updateEmailText: All details entered previously will be cleared if you edit the email address. You will then need to restart the process to create a new user.
createuser.createUserError: Sorry, we were unable to create this user account due to a technical issue. Please try again.

options.name: Create/Amend order
options.tooltip: Place orders and make changes as required.

options.name: View order
options.tooltip: View order details only. No ability to make order updates.

options.name: Search order
options.tooltip: Search for orders. No ability to make order updates.

options.name: Monthly statement
options.tooltip: View monthly statements containing invoice and credit details.

options.name: Settlement advice
options.tooltip: Access daily accounting details of what Shell will draft from your bank account.

options.name: Account summary
options.tooltip: View information on account balance, available credit, and last payment made.

options.name: Rolling statement
options.tooltip: View a date based statement that allows you to choose open items, closed items or both.

options.name: Billing documents
options.tooltip: View debits and credits that are placed on your account based on recent activity.

options.name: DFOA reimburesement report
options.tooltip: Access a report that shows only DFOA credit memos

options.name: Delivery documents
options.tooltip: Access delivery records such as Delivery notes or Advanced shipping notices.

options.name: Delivery ticket
options.tooltip: View ePOD notifications.

options.name: Distributor academy
options.tooltip: Access a training area where distributors can learn more about Shell products.

options.name: Marketing information
options.tooltip: Get up to date relevant information about Shell’s local marketing campaigns.

options.name: Card report
options.tooltip: View any card charges that have been made at a retail station.

options.name: Sales value
options.tooltip: Get a summary of the value of products purchased for a specific time period

options.name: Sales volume
options.tooltip: Get a summary of the quantity of productspurchased for a specific time period

options.name: DFOA Customer restrictions report
options.tooltip: Access a list of customers that do not allow ‘after event’ orders by a distributor.

options.name: Shell product report
options.tooltip: Access the warehouse product list required to service Shell's customers.

options.name: DFOA Create order
options.tooltip: Distributor can place orders for end use Shellcustomers. Only available in US and Canada.

options.name: DFOA Edit order
options.tooltip: Make minor modifications to orders created by another userfor an end use customer.

options.name: DFOA Amend/cancel order
options.tooltip: Modify or cancel orders that have been created for an end use customer

options.name: DFOA View/Confirm order
options.tooltip: Confirm deliveries made on behalf of Shell.

options.name: View pricing
options.tooltip: View pricing across all products.

profile.notificationnotsupporting: Your country code is not supported for SMS text. Currently we only support the following countrires: Germany, Indonesia, India and Turkey.

profile.jobtitletooltip: Select a job title which most closely represents your day to day work.
profile.linkedintooltip: Grow your professional network by sharing your LinkedIn profile.
profile.mobiletooltip: We’ll use this as additional security if you log in from a new location. You can also choose to receive order updates straight to your mobile.
profile.preferedmethodtooltip: We will use this to contact you regarding any account queries or issues.

profile.profilerror: Sorry, we were unable to save your changes due to a technical issue. Please try again.

profile.privilageToolTip: A user will have a different actions (or privileges) available to them depending on their job role.
profile.userStatusToolTip: This shows whether a user is active, or if their account has been deactivated.
profile.passcodesent: We've sent a One Time Passcode to

profile.passcodeinvalid: We're unable to verify this number. It's either associated with another user or the passcode is incorrect. Please try again or go back to change your number.
profile.notificationnotsupports: Notifications are all set to email. We are not yet able to send SMS updates to customers in your country.
profile.msgOverlaytitle: Please save or cancel your changes before you navigate away from this page
profile.noSuperUserTooltip: Super Users can assist with issues regarding your account access.

tooltiptext.creditavailable: Available Credit = ( Total Credit Limit - Overdue - Outstanding within Term )
tooltiptext.remainingcredit: Remaining Credit = ( Total Credit Limit - Overdue - Outstanding within Term - Open order Value )

tooltiptext.lastpaymentamount: Amount of last payment received and recorded
tooltiptext.amountdue: Amount owed for all invoiced orders
tooltiptext.overdue: Shows any amount due outside of the payment terms.
tooltiptext.outstandingwithinterm: Shows any amount due within the payment terms.
tooltiptext.openordervalue: The total of all orders that have not been invoiced or delivered yet.
